sentence.Network_en: This could occur as a result of some structural instability or looseness in the shell.
sentence.Network_cn: 当外壳产生某些结构不稳定或松动时,就能产生这种情况.

sentence.Network_en: The flexibility and looseness of the materials from which mythology is made.
sentence.Network_cn: 神话的取材往往随意灵活.

sentence.Network_en: Misunderstandings can often be traced to a looseness of expression.
sentence.Network_cn: 误会常常源于疏于表达.
